title: A Comprehensive Review on Liquid Electrolyte Design for Low-Temperature Lithium/Sodium Metal Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02060J, Review Article
Zhenxin Huang, Zichun Xiao, Ruoshan Jin, Zhen Li, Chengyong Shu, Renyi Shi, Xiaowei Wang, Zexun Tang, Wei Tang, Yuping Wu
Lithium/sodium metal batteries (LMBs/SMBs) possess immense potential for various applications due to their high energy density. Nevertheless, the LMBs/SMBs are highly susceptible to the detrimental effects of unstable solid electrolyte...
